TEDx Talk

14 May 2013

So a few weeks ago I presented at TEDxCanberra Salon 2013. It was a great experience and a massive learning curve, it really made me think. It was an opportunity to synthesise my ideas on life, philosophy, climate, and my experiences — into the one 18-minute talk.

How did it go? Well, here is the video of my talk… Make up your own mind (:

Jahla Gato
Geek, armchair philosopher, fashion designer
